verses.verse: וְזֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> ve-Zot likewise תּוֹרַ֖ת <S%H8451><s%> to-Rat Likewise this [is] the law הָאָשָׁ֑ם <S%H817><s%> ha-'a-Sham; of the trespass offering קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> ka-da-Shim holy הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

בִּמְק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> bim-Kom, In the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher where יִשְׁחֲטוּ֙ <S%H7819><s%> yish-cha-Tu where they kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָ֣עֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah, the burnt offering יִשְׁחֲט֖וּ <S%H7819><s%> yish-cha-Tu shall they kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָשָׁ֑ם <S%H817><s%> ha-'a-Sham; the trespass offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et דָּמ֛וֹ <S%H1818><s%> da-Mo and the blood יִזְרֹ֥ק <S%H2236><s%> yiz-Rok thereof shall he sprinkle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv. round about

וְאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all חֶלְבּ֖וֹ <S%H2459><s%> chel-Bo of it all the fat יַקְרִ֣יב <S%H7126><s%> yak-Riv And he shall offer מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu; at אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et הָֽאַלְיָ֔ה <S%H451><s%> ha-'al-Yah, thereof the rump וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַחֵ֖לֶב <S%H2459><s%> ha-Che-lev and the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֥ה <S%H3680><s%> ham-chas-Seh that covereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַקֶּֽרֶב׃ <S%H7130><s%> hak-Ke-rev. the inwards

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei And the two הַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <S%H3629><s%> hak-ke-la-Yot, kidneys וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <S%H2459><s%> ha-Che-lev and the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עֲלֵיהֶ֔ן <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hen, is on אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is on הַכְּסָלִ֑ים <S%H3689><s%> hak-ke-sa-Lim; that [is] on them which [is] by the flanks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַיֹּתֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H3508><s%> hai-yo-Te-ret and the caul עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַכָּבֵ֔ד <S%H3516><s%> hak-ka-Ved, [that is] above the liver עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- with הַכְּלָיֹ֖ת <S%H3629><s%> hak-ke-la-Yot with the kidneys יְסִירֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H5493><s%> ye-si-Ren-nah. it shall he take away

וְהִקְטִ֨יר <S%H6999><s%> ve-hik-Tir shall burn אֹתָ֤ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen And the priest הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-chah, them upon the altar אִשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Sheh [for] an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD אָשָׁ֖ם <S%H817><s%> 'a-Sham it [is] a trespass offering הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- Every זָכָ֥ר <S%H2145><s%> za-Char Every male בַּכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> bak-ko-ha-Nim among the priests יֹאכְלֶ֑נּוּ <S%H398><s%> yo-che-Len-nu; shall eat בְּמָק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> be-ma-Kom place קָדוֹשׁ֙ <S%H6918><s%> ka-do-Vosh in the holy יֵאָכֵ֔ל <S%H398><s%> ye-'a-Chel, thereof it shall be eaten קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> ka-da-Shim holy הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

כַּֽחַטָּאת֙ <S%H2403><s%> ka-chat-taT As the sin offering כָּֽאָשָׁ֔ם <S%H817><s%> ka-'a-Sham, [is] so [is] the trespass offering תּוֹרָ֥ה <S%H8451><s%> to-Rah law אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat [there is] one לָהֶ֑ם la-Hem; הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen for them the priest אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יְכַפֶּר־ <S%H3722><s%> ye-chap-per- that maketh atonement בּ֖וֹ bo ל֥וֹ lo יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh. shall have

וְהַ֨כֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> ve-Hak-ko-Hen, And the priest הַמַּקְרִ֖יב <S%H7126><s%> ham-mak-Riv that offereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֹ֣לַת <S%H5930><s%> 'O-lat burnt offering אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish; any man's ע֤וֹר <S%H5785><s%> or shall have to himself the skin הָֽעֹלָה֙ <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah of the burnt offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הִקְרִ֔יב <S%H7126><s%> hik-Riv, which he hath offered לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> lak-ko-Hen [even] the priest ל֥וֹ lo יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh. shall have

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol every מִנְחָ֗ה <S%H4503><s%> min-Chah, And all the meat offering אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher is תֵּֽאָפֶה֙ <S%H644><s%> te-'a-Peh that is baken בַּתַּנּ֔וּר <S%H8574><s%> bat-tan-Nur, in the oven וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and everything נַעֲשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-Sah and all that is dressed בַמַּרְחֶ֖שֶׁת <S%H4227><s%> vam-mar-Che-shet and in the pan וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- in מַחֲבַ֑ת <S%H4802><s%> ma-cha-Vat; in the fryingpan לַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> lak-ko-Hen shall be the priest's הַמַּקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> ham-mak-Riv that offereth אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah ל֥וֹ lo תִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> Tih-Yeh. shall belong

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol Every מִנְחָ֥ה <S%H4503><s%> min-Chah And every meat offering בְלוּלָֽה־ <S%H1101><s%> ve-lu-lah- mingled בַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> vash-She-men with oil וַחֲרֵבָ֑ה <S%H2720><s%> va-cha-re-Vah; and dry לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol to all בְּנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei shall all the sons אַהֲרֹ֛ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron תִּהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh shall belong אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish have one כְּאָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> ke-'a-Chiv. [as much] as another פ Peh

וְזֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> ve-Zot likewise תּוֹרַ֖ת <S%H8451><s%> to-Rat And this [is] the law זֶ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> Ze-vach of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <S%H8002><s%> hash-she-la-Mim; of peace offerings אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יַקְרִ֖יב <S%H7126><s%> yak-Riv which he shall offer לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

אִ֣ם <S%H518><s%> 'im If עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- way תּוֹדָה֮ <S%H8426><s%> to-Dah it for a thanksgiving יַקְרִיבֶנּוּ֒ <S%H7126><s%> yak-ri-ven-Nu If he offer וְהִקְרִ֣יב׀ <S%H7126><s%> ve-hik-Riv then he shall offer עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- along זֶ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> Ze-vach with the sacrifice הַתּוֹדָ֗ה <S%H8426><s%> hat-to-Dah, of thanksgiving חַלּ֤וֹת <S%H2471><s%> chal-Lot cakes מַצּוֹת֙ <S%H4682><s%> matz-tzOt unleavened בְּלוּלֹ֣ת <S%H1101><s%> be-lu-Lot mingled בַּשֶּׁ֔מֶן <S%H8081><s%> bash-She-men, with oil וּרְקִיקֵ֥י <S%H7550><s%> u-re-ki-Kei wafers מַצּ֖וֹת <S%H4682><s%> matz-Tzot and unleavened מְשֻׁחִ֣ים <S%H4886><s%> me-shu-Chim anointed בַּשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> bash-Sha-men; with oil וְסֹ֣לֶת <S%H5560><s%> ve-So-let of fine flour מֻרְבֶּ֔כֶת <S%H7246><s%> mur-Be-chet, fried חַלֹּ֖ת <S%H2471><s%> chal-Lot and cakes בְּלוּלֹ֥ת <S%H1101><s%> be-lu-Lot mingled בַּשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> bash-Sha-men. with oil

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- with חַלֹּת֙ <S%H2471><s%> chal-Lot Besides the cakes לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem bread חָמֵ֔ץ <S%H2557><s%> cha-Metz, leavened יַקְרִ֖יב <S%H7126><s%> yak-Riv he shall offer קָרְבָּנ֑וֹ <S%H7133><s%> ka-re-ba-No; [for] his offering עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- with זֶ֖בַח <S%H2077><s%> Ze-vach with the sacrifice תּוֹדַ֥ת <S%H8426><s%> to-Dat of thanksgiving שְׁלָמָֽיו׃ <S%H8002><s%> she-la-Mav. of his peace offerings

וְהִקְרִ֨יב <S%H7126><s%> ve-hik-Riv And of it he shall offer מִמֶּ֤נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu at אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad one מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol of every קָרְבָּ֔ן <S%H7133><s%> kor-ban out of the whole oblation תְּרוּמָ֖ה <S%H8641><s%> te-ru-Mah [for] an heave offering לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD לַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> lak-ko-Hen, [and] it shall be the priest's הַזֹּרֵ֛ק <S%H2236><s%> haz-zo-Rek that sprinkleth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דַּ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> dam the blood הַשְּׁלָמִ֖ים <S%H8002><s%> hash-she-la-Mim of the peace offerings ל֥וֹ lo יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh. shall belong

וּבְשַׂ֗ר <S%H1320><s%> u-ve-Sar, And the flesh זֶ֚בַח <S%H2077><s%> Ze-vach of the sacrifice תּוֹדַ֣ת <S%H8426><s%> to-Dat for thanksgiving שְׁלָמָ֔יו <S%H8002><s%> she-la-Mav, of his peace offerings בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom the same day קָרְבָּנ֖וֹ <S%H7133><s%> ka-re-ba-No that it is offered יֵאָכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> ye-'a-Chel; shall be eaten לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not יַנִּ֥יחַ <S%H3240><s%> yan-Ni-ach he shall not leave מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu any עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until בֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> Bo-ker. any of it until the morning

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if נֶ֣דֶר׀ <S%H5088><s%> Ne-der [be] a vow א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or נְדָבָ֗ה <S%H5071><s%> ne-da-Vah, or a voluntary offering זֶ֚בַח <S%H2077><s%> Ze-vach But if the sacrifice קָרְבָּנ֔וֹ <S%H7133><s%> ka-re-ba-No, of his offering בְּי֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom the same day הַקְרִיב֥וֹ <S%H7126><s%> hak-ri-Vo that he offereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זִבְח֖וֹ <S%H2077><s%> ziv-Cho his sacrifice יֵאָכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> ye-'a-Chel; it shall be eaten וּמִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <S%H4283><s%> u-mi-mo-cho-Rat, and on the morrow וְהַנּוֹתָ֥ר <S%H3498><s%> ve-han-no-Tar also the remainder מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu of it יֵאָכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> ye-'a-Chel. of it shall be eaten

וְהַנּוֹתָ֖ר <S%H3498><s%> ve-han-no-Tar But the remainder מִבְּשַׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> mib-be-Sar of the flesh הַזָּ֑בַח <S%H2077><s%> haz-Za-vach; of the sacrifice בַּיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> bai-yOm day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi, on the third בָּאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh with fire יִשָּׂרֵֽף׃ <S%H8313><s%> yis-sa-Ref. shall be burnt

וְאִ֣ם <S%H518><s%> ve-'Im if הֵאָכֹ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> he-'a-Chol all manner יֵ֠אָכֵל <S%H398><s%> Ye-'a-chel be eaten מִבְּשַׂר־ <S%H1320><s%> mib-be-sar- And if [any] of the flesh זֶ֨בַח <S%H2077><s%> Ze-vach of the sacrifice שְׁלָמָ֜יו <S%H8002><s%> she-la-Mav of his peace offerings בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁלִישִׁי֮ <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi on the third לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יֵרָצֶה֒ <S%H7521><s%> ye-ra-Tzeh it shall not be accepted הַמַּקְרִ֣יב <S%H7126><s%> ham-mak-Riv unto him that offereth אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> lo it יֵחָשֵׁ֛ב <S%H2803><s%> ye-cha-Shev neither shall it be imputed ל֖וֹ lo פִּגּ֣וּל <S%H6292><s%> pig-Gul it it shall be an abomination יִהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh; become וְהַנֶּ֛פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> ve-han-Ne-fesh and the soul הָאֹכֶ֥לֶת <S%H398><s%> ha-'o-Che-let at all מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu any עֲוֹנָ֥הּ <S%H5771><s%> 'a-vo-Nah his iniquity תִּשָּֽׂא׃ <S%H5375><s%> tis-Sa. of it shall bear
